input.name: ctl00$ctl01

a.style: position:absolute; left:-999px; top:auto; width:1px; height:1px; overflow:hidden; z-index:-999;

img.alt: Louisiana Believes - Louisiana Department of Education

a.alt: BOARD OF ELEMENTARY AND SECONDARY EDUCATION

div.p: On April 15, Gov. John Bel Edwards signed a proclamation to extend the closure of public school facilities to students for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year, to curb the spread of COVID-19. School systems are currently engaging students in distance education.
Explore this page to find resources for families, as well as up-to-date information and guidance for schools and centers.

img.title: Find a School Meal Site Button
Find Your Child Care Provider Button

em.span: Documents on this page are being continuously updated. If you've opened a document more than once, please clear your history/cache and refresh the page to view the most up-to-date version.

p.a: FAQ for Child Care Centers and Providers
Becoming an In-home and FCC Provider

br.a: Child Care Availability for Critical Personnel
Louisiana Child Care Assistance Provider (LaCAP) Relief Grants
Continuous Education for Students with Disabilities: Direct Services
Continuous Learning for Students with Disabilities Supporting Guidance Documents
Family Toolbox: Ways to Support Students with Disabilities During School Closures
Timelines and Documentation During Extended School Closures for Students with Disabilities
Supporting ELs During School Closures_Distance Learning
Louisiana Continuous Education Toolkit - Guidance and Tools
Louisiana Continuous Education Toolkit - Academic Resources
Senior Course Credit and Graduation Guidance

div.p: For additional information about COVID-19, visit the Louisiana Department of Health and the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention websites. You can also contact the Louisiana 211 Network by dialing 211, or text the keyword LACOVID to 898-211.
div.span: For additional education-specific information, visit the COVID-19 library and the Newsroom. You can also email LDOECOVID19Support@la.gov.

Louisiana Department of Education
1201 North Third Street
Baton Rouge, LA 70802-5243
Toll-Free 1.877.453.2721
